bibl.title: Peter Williamson Merta v. Henry M. White. Stipulation
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: In the Distric Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington.
In the Matter of the Application of PETER WILLIAMSON MERTA, for Writ of Habeas Corpus.
Filed in the United States District Court Western District of Washington
In the Matter of the Application of PETER WILLIAMSON MERTA, for Writ of Habeas Corpus.

IT IS STIPULATED AND AGREED by and between Ralph S. Pierce, Attorney for the above named applicant, and United States Attorney Robert C. Saunders, Attorney for respondent Henry M. White, that the exhibit attached to respondent's return herein, being the record of proceedings before the Immigration authorities, and the testimony adduced in said proceedings with relation to the deportation of said applicant, may be withdrawn from the records and files of this court.
Dated this 24 day of January, A.D. 1919.
